    Angular.js

    ReadMore

    AngularJS â€” Superheroic JavaScript MVW Framework

    Angular.js - is a fast Javascript MVW Framework. Angular.js

    I Got this tip from Helen, Helen V. Holmes My Ask about her Page Script and Code, because the Page have only a frame in the index.html file and the rest based on Javascript.

    The angular.js file is the only one we need for a running AngularJS application. Now i get start with Google Angular.js. Do you can download the CDN file here Angular.js Alternative, do cou can download it and integrate locally. -

    Helen V. Holmes Designer and Front-End Web Developer @Capital One - U.S.A

    By the attribute ng app in HTML tag AngularJS recognizes our side now than AngularJS application. AngularJS searched by the page for specific tags and attributes that belong to the framework. The Directives are in angular.js.
